meanings.definition: The side of a vehicle that is visible when looking at it from the outside.
meanings.sent1: The red car's bodyside was shiny in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: She leaned against the bodyside of the truck to take a break.
meanings.sent3: The bodyside of the bus blushed when it accidentally honked loudly.
meanings.sent4: The bodyside of the train stretched endlessly along the tracks.
meanings.sent5: The bodyside of the airplane gleamed like a mirror in the hangar.

meanings.definition: The part of a person's body that is facing a certain direction.
meanings.sent1: He felt a chill on his bodyside as the cold wind blew.
meanings.sent2: She placed her hand on her bodyside to feel her heartbeat.
meanings.sent3: The bodyside of the dancer moved gracefully to the music.
meanings.sent4: His bodyside tensed up when he heard a sudden noise.
meanings.sent5: The warm sun kissed her bodyside as she lay on the beach.

meanings.definition: The outer surface of a structure or object.
meanings.sent1: The bodyside of the building was covered in ivy.
meanings.sent2: He examined the bodyside of the rock for any markings.
meanings.sent3: The bodyside of the cake was decorated with colorful frosting.
meanings.sent4: The bodyside of the bookshelf held all his favorite books.
meanings.sent5: The bodyside of the mountain glowed pink in the sunset.
